name: Ch.10ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Colm;Ok, now that the Princess is here, we can settle this.
speak;Eirika;Why did you bring me here?|We've got to hurry you know?
speak;Joshua;This won't take long.|I just want to prove to him that I'm faster.
speak;Colm;No way!|I'm totally faster than you!|Right, Princess?
speak;Colm;Well, we will need to race then!|That's why you're here!|Joshua and I will race and we want you to be the judge!
speak;Joshua;Yeah, though we will know I will win.|You ready, Colm?
speak;Colm;I'm ready to beat you and prove I'm the fastest!
speak;Colm;I totally won that one, didn't I!
speak;Colm;Ha!|I told you I'm the fastest Joshua!
speak;Joshua;Bah, you just caught me at a bad day.|I'll show you that I'm the fastest another day!
speak;Colm;Ha ha!|I'll take on your challenge anytime!
speak;Joshua;I told you I was the fastest!
speak;Colm;Grrrr...|Just you wait Joshua!|I'll be faster than you soon!
speak;Joshua;Ha!|I'd like to see you try!
